name: Vile Aint Us
description:
"Enemies! Laser guns! Unbreakable turrets! You are a monster people want to kill! Survival is your only motto, proceed is your only option!" - Trailer -     - Controls -    
 - Description -     

Vile Ain't Us is a top down action 3D game, the player plays as an orange monster trying to escape a facility full of enemies that wants to take its life. In order to survive, the player needs to think fast and with caution. Don't be afraid to kill the enemies, for else they will kill you. 

- Credits -     

Product owner - Jonathan

Programming - Jonathan, Emil

3D modeling - Jonathan, Hammad

Design - Hammad, Evan

Music - Bobben

Level design - Emil, Evan
